Blog.post: Today is the 2nd day i writin this. i quite new to this. Sumhow i still quite confused. I wana create a Linkin Park background. How huh? haha. anyway, today is a day lyk sum other days except tt i went out to the library wif my mom n sis. well, is juz sum ordinary day. life reali sucks man. i hope tt i can grow older n den i can haf all the fun. now i kind of being controlled by my parents still. i guess i still a kid huhz. i havin a veri important year this yr. howeva, my studies still sucks lyk hell. i guess i dun reali haf much to write so this is kinda boring. wonder how is it lyk to be dead? will my spirit juz wander around along the streets wifout being seen by the people? will i be able to feel? will i be able to eat or drink? will i be able to think? will i be able to tok? will i be me?

Today is the day when i really walk the earth. It marks the beginning of my new life-dead. In the past, i been throu the gd n bad times. Yt i survive, however one did not allow me to live. One which actually hurt me emotionally n veri bad. Sumhow i feel tt there is no meaning in life as it seem to have taken everyting from me. Darkness juz fall upon me. Why m i here? Who m i important to?Who exactly m i? I was juz nth bt a little speck of dust, wondering around. Wherever the wind goes, i go. Do not have my own opinion as i m too shy to speak out. Thou i may look strong, bt i m onli pretendin......

i still nt used to this ting. how m i supose to put my pictures n decorate ahz...getin kinda bored wif this....now i m kinda sick...feelin worst den dis afternoon....i tink i gona be sick lor....haizz.....bored bored bored..next week is my o level chinese results is out...duno how i will do....so nervous..hope a distinction bt canot be lor...haiz..
